MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Buckley, affecting properties in Fraser Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:29am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate unconfirmed reports of  3rd party damage to our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:30pm 28th October 2020
